phrases: Once upon a time, there was a girl who loved flowers more than anyone.
She prayed every day for the whole town to be filled with beautiful flowers.
To make that happen, she pulled up all the ugly weeds in town.
Eventually the girl's prayers were answered and the town was blanketed in flowers.
But they say the town that was filled with blossoms of all colors looked gray somehow.
Rue-chan came back looking like herself.
Is she really Kraehe after all?
Is it Kraehe's fault that Mytho tried to take Pike's heart?
Is something happening, behind the scenes where I cannot see it?
I do not want to fight anymore...
Say, why do not you fight one more time?
But a chance like this does not come along every day, so a magnificent battle...
Besides, I used to be into Mytho-sama too, but frankly my passion has cooled off.
At this point, I really do not care.
In the end, I have always been a Fakir-sama girl!
Fakir-sama definitely is cool lately, is not he?
Like that air of mystery, for instance.
You mean that air of a shady criminal!
And that slight aura of darkness.
Have you become a Fakir-sama girl too, Ahiru?
I am saying I do not like fighting, or rather, you should not fight...
But if he would carry me that way, getting hurt might not be so bad.
I want to be held by Mytho-senpai like that too!
I have divine news for you all.
The Gold Crown Academy Fine Arts Week starts tomorrow,
and Mytho-san says that whoever wins this ballet contest
will be his partner in the Exhibition in place of Rue-san
who is injured and cannot dance.
This kind of chance comes once in a lifetime!
Do not rejoice just yet, ladies.
The runner-up will have the great opportunity to be my partner!
What is more, my partner in LIFE!
I have interpreted this to mean that everyone is aiming for runner-up and has begun practicing hard right away!
I am sure I saw Mytho and Rue go this way...
It is not so easy pretending to be injured.
I did not mean to intrude!
No, that is not what I meant!
I mean, of course the flowers are pretty!
Did you grow all these flowers, Freya-san?
I just pray: Bloom prettily, bloom abundantly.
Say, do not you have to practice, Freya-san?
You mean for the Arts Festival competition?
I like ballet just like you do, so I am going to practice later.
As soon as I am finished taking care of these little ones.
You really love flowers, do not you?
Well, it would be wonderful if the world were full of flowers, right?
It makes me wish I could become this wonderful.
Where did you hide it zura?
You DO have a tail zura.
Just who was that kid, anyway?
Thanks to her I was late and now I have detention.
I am not really hoping to win...
Your beautiful heart makes beautiful flowers bloom.
If we put our abilities together...
I am sure we could make a kind of flower we have never seen before bloom.
There is no one in the world with such a beautiful heart that they want to make the world happy with dancing and flowers.
Even you believe that, do not you?
It is all right to think that.
Because you are different from all those nobodies.
And you will win the competition.
Everyone around you is your enemy.
Love only me, and regard all others with hatred.
Yes, I will love only you, and hate everyone else.
The room's full of flowers we have never seen before, is not it Mytho-sama?
The real you does not want to hate anyone, does she?
You still have not been completely soaked in raven's blood?
Hurry up and become my prince and mine alone.
The prince who loves me alone.
In a place where Little Duck cannot see it.
We will be holding the ballet competition momentarily.
The winner will dance with Mytho-san as his partner.
And the runner-up will dance eternally as my partner!
The participants must be feeling a nervousness such as they have never felt before.
After all, if they win it is Heaven, but if they make one false step it is Hell.
Now, let us start the competition without delay.
Everyone try your best, aiming for this runner-up bouquet!
I do not want to lose.
The one to become his partner...
The mood's so tense you can hardly breathe.
I wish Ahiru could have been in the contest too.
Come to think of it, where is Ahiru?
Does not she care who becomes Mytho-sama's partner?
Does that mean she is completely a Fakir-sama girl now?
I sense a battle on the horizon!
Even Mytho will not be able to do anything funny during the competition, right?
I am just showing up out of the blue; I wonder if Fakir is home...
But Fakir, do you know this girl?
Did you do something to her?
I was looking for her tail and I found her butt zura!
Have you calmed down a little?
Karon made her out of the bits of wood from Edel that did not burn away.
Is that why she knew me?
No, I told her about you.
I told her about you and Mytho and things.
But it looks like Edel's memories are gone.
Burned away in the flame that warmed my body and guided you and Mytho...
I am glad I get to see her again, even if it is like this.
Now that you have told me, she does kind of resemble Edel somehow...
Anyway, did not you have some reason for coming?
A few days ago... he tried to take Pike's heart.
That did not work, so now he is trying to do the same thing to Freya-san...
The heart shard of love that Princess Tutu gave back to him...
It was soaked in the raven's blood.
He will find a young and beautiful heart for my father and give it to him as a sacrifice.
Did you tell her about this?
If I did that I could make Tutu suffer, could not I?
Hey, what do you think happened to Mytho?
I just thought you might have found out something, so I came to see, that is all.
Well, I am worried about Freya-san, so I am going to go back.
Uzura, I am leaving you to house-sit.
I do not get it zura.
The dancing is adequate, but their expressions just do not work.
As it stands, there is no one who qualifies for winner or runner-up.
Above all, her expressions are great.
No, you must mean the runner-up.
I can smell the sweet scent from here...
This time I will definitely bring you a heart that shines blackly, Father.
And that is the time when your efforts will be rewarded, my daughter.
Oh, but if we just talked to Mytho...
You just need to do what I tell you.
Unfortunately, no one qualified for runner-up this year!
And with that, I declare the competition over!
Your heart is young and beautiful.
Dyed black, it is giving off a particularly strong fragrance.
You will give it to me, will not you?
Dance as proof of your love for me.
Quit showing up all the time.
Are you going to get in the way of Mytho and me again?
Were not flowers your hope, your prayer, your wish?
Yes, that is right, that is what I want, what I pray for.
Is this really what you wanted them to look like?
Listen closely... to the voices of the flowers you loved.
I cannot hear the voices of the flowers!
Yes, your prayer for everyone to be happy.
That was what you wished for, was not it, Freya-san?
I can hear the voices of the flowers!
Why will not you love me?!
There is no need to listen to a knight who should have died.
The way you are now is the real Mytho.
Kraehe, did you do something to Mytho?
You are the one who made the prince like this, Tutu.
You are the one who returned the feeling of love to the prince, without even knowing it was dyed in the raven's blood.
You did not tell her, Fakir?
I am grateful to you, Tutu.
Hey, are you angry with me because I kept it from you?
Even if he is got raven's blood in him, Mytho is Mytho, so he will go back to his old self someday, right?
Now there is one less thing you do not know.
But would it have been better to stay ignorant?
I am someone who is qualified to be a true prince, someone who loves everyone and is loved by everyone!
I told you, there is no Rue.
Because I get this feeling you are Rue-chan.
When they say at school that Ahiru goes well together and is lovey-dovey and it is good, what do they mean zura?
A feeling that gets across even when you do not speak it...
That is the mime for I love you!
All you children who love stories, come gather around.
The voice calling, come now, wake up
The brilliant light and the dew on trees are born
By the secret water's edge that no one knows of
Dance the pas de deux of life
It is a gentle, yet fierce current
How far does the labyrinth stretch?
I loved like I was dreaming
I thought how wonderful it was to be alive
I want to be there for you
Passing by even the wind and the rain clouds
